== IBM Thinkpad X40, Type 2371 ==

Global Machine Specs: Intel Pentium M, 1,2 GHz LV, 1024MB RAM, 12,1" XGA TFT, 40GB 1,8" Hitachi HDD, Intel 855GM Graphics, BIOS Version 2.08 (2006-12-21), Embedded Controller Version 1.62 (detailed specs at the end of this Report)

=== Maverick Meerkat ===
Tested with the live environment from a burned ISO image using an external USB-attached DVD drive.

==== Remarks ====
* his-001: Finally the i855GM bug seems to be fixed, the notebook does not boot with a blank screen anymore. Unfortunately the "Monitor Preferences" do not offer any options to change screen size
* exc-001: There is no example folder linked in the home folder. After going to /usr/share/example-content, the test case was completed, but the sound and video playback was not smooth.
* snr-001: Everything went fine, but the LiveCD got detached/umounted somehow and rendered the system nearly unoperable!
* hcn-002: message "ifdown: interface eth0 not configured" was received. (Propably because Network Manager is running in the background?)
* hwn-002: Wireless was unchecked, but eth0 and eth1 were displayed nevertheless
